title: Is it true that Wilmington is trying to place public housing behind the Food Lion on 17th and College?  I heard something about this on the radio recently from a caller on one of the morning shows.  I have been unable to discover any news article on this on Star News to verify if this is a factual event.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=12797
